Posted By: Mike Peich
Hello-
Selling a Raymond T3 with good corners, great gloss, and an ad back. There is small pinhole under the -D in the name plate preventing this from being a strong PSA 4. First $200 takes it.
Happy End of the Summer, Mike

For scans: [url]http://s137.photobucket.com/albums/q218/mpeich/T3%20Raymond/[/url]
